data.actual_result: Notes are not removing if it is removed completely
data.expected_result: The Notes must be removed if user removed in other clients
data.short_description: User notes is not updating in Android
data.steps_to_repro: - In Desktop type some note of an user and watch the mobile simultaneously of that user notes - A small change is updated in real-time, but if i delete all it is not changing - The notes remains there
